company.name: Prism Agency
company.description: Prism Agency creates beautiful websites, apps, and designs that shatter revenue goals for ambitious businesses. Founded by Enzo Sison, we specialize in AI-powered digital solutions that convert visitors into customers.

primary.name: Website Development
primary.description: Custom websites built with AI-powered optimization for maximum conversion rates

primary.name: Mobile App Development
primary.description: Native and cross-platform mobile applications that drive user engagement

primary.name: Digital Marketing
primary.description: AI-powered marketing campaigns that generate qualified leads and increase revenue

primary.name: UI/UX Design
primary.description: Beautiful, user-centered designs that improve customer experience and conversion

methodology.name: The Prism Method
methodology.description: A 4-step process for creating revenue-focused digital solutions

steps.name: Discovery & Strategy
steps.description: Understanding your business goals and target audience

steps.name: Development & Testing
steps.description: Building with AI-powered optimization and thorough testing

steps.name: Launch & Growth
steps.description: Deploying and continuously optimizing for maximum results

founder.name: Enzo Sison
founder.title: Founder & CEO
founder.description: Former Apple intern turned digital agency founder, specializing in AI-powered business solutions

frequently_asked_questions.question: What makes Prism different from other digital agencies?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: We specialize in AI-powered solutions that focus on revenue growth, not just pretty designs. Our proven methodology has helped businesses achieve 300%+ increases in conversions.

frequently_asked_questions.question: How much does a website cost?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Our websites start at $2,500 and are customized based on your specific needs. We offer flexible pricing options including monthly plans starting at $297.

frequently_asked_questions.question: What's included in your website development service?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Complete website design and development, AI-powered optimization, mobile responsiveness, SEO setup, hosting, and ongoing support.

frequently_asked_questions.question: How long does it take to build a website?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Most websites are completed in 2-4 weeks, depending on complexity. We provide regular updates throughout the process.

frequently_asked_questions.question: Do you work with small businesses?
frequently_asked_questions.answer: Yes! We specialize in helping small and medium businesses grow their revenue through beautiful, conversion-focused digital solutions.
